channel.title: Zeromq on Nep Gear
channel.description: Recent content in Zeromq on Nep Gear

item.title: Desarrollo de NEP en MATLAB < 2017b
item.description:
Para desarrollar NEP en versiones anteriores a 2017.b en Matlab se debe utilizar Java SDK 7.

Para el desarrollo de .jar que puedan utilizar Netbeans desde el siguiente link:

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk-7-netbeans-download-432126.html

Librer√≠as necesarias son:

  • GSON (https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.google.code.gson/gson)
  • JeroMQ (https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.zeromq/jeromq)

How to build .jar:

  • Right-click on the Project name
  • Select Properties
  • Click Packaging
  • Check Build JAR after Compiling
  • Check Compress JAR File
  • Click OK to accept changes
  • Right-click on a Project name
  • Select Build or Clean and Build

.jar is save in dist folder
